snippet: COCHRANE--Lydia Goodwin (Steinway). Youngest child of Ruth and Theodore Steinway, and the last of her generation. Survived by sons John and Nicholas, their wives Elizabeth Fama and Ginger Gregory, and six grandchildren. While she spent most of her adult life in Chicago and Italy, part of her remained a New Yorker. Her East Coast nephews, nieces, great-nephews and great-nieces are saddened by her death and send condolences to John, Nick and the rest of the Cochrane clan. 1/3
lead_paragraph: COCHRANE--Lydia Goodwin (Steinway). Youngest child of Ruth and Theodore Steinway, and the last of her generation. Survived by sons John and Nicholas, their wives Elizabeth Fama and Ginger Gregory, and six grandchildren. While she spent most of her adult life in Chicago and Italy, part of her remained a New Yorker. Her East Coast nephews, nieces, great-nephews and great-nieces are saddened by her death and send condolences to John, Nick and the rest of the Cochrane clan. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  COCHRANE, LYDIA GOODWIN (STEINWAY)
